statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'jane_smith' OR email = 'jane@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_smith';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id >= 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username IN ('john_doe', 'jane_smith');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE session_expiry > '2022-01-01' AND user_id < 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'u%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 3 AND session_expiry > NOW();
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(la.attempt_id) AS total_attempts FROM users u LEFT JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(la.attempt_id) AS total_attempts FROM users u LEFT JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id WHERE la.attempt_time > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_roles.role_name, user_permissions.permission_name FROM user_roles INNER JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping rm ON u.user_id = rm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permission_mapping pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id JOIN user_permissions p ON pm.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping rm ON u.user_id = rm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permission_mapping pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id JOIN user_permissions p ON pm.permission_id = p.permission_id ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.role_name DESC;
